text:
Pablo Casado Blanco (born 1 February 1981) is a Spanish politician. He is the leader of the People's Party. He is one of the three deputies for Ávila in the national Congress of Deputies and has held that office since 2011.
From 2015 to 2018 he also s]was Vice Secretary-General of Communication of the People's Party (PP). Since July 2018 he has been the president of the PP.
